title: Great sausage casserole
description: The Hairy Bikers’ take on sausage and beans makes a wonderfully warming and filling dish, and it freezes brilliantly.
ingredients: 6 rashers rindless streaky bacon, cut into 2.5cm/1in lengths
½–1 tsp hot chilli powder or smoked paprika
1 x 400g/14oz can butter beans or mixed beans
salt and freshly ground black pepper
